name: Dice Jail
description:
Controls:

Jump: Space, Gamepad bottom button
Move: WASD, Arrow Keys, D-pad, Left Stick
Confirm Menus: Enter or Gamepad bottom button
Pause: Esc or Start
Controllers may not work on Firefox but Xbox One controller is confirmed to work on Chrome.

Credits:

Code: Signplus, Travh98, Shrek2HDonDVD
Music: SneakyTex (kid2will)
Art: Signplus, Trav98

Most Art taken from Kenney

Hint: Ramps have weird physics when you run up them.
